properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 15 at 1:18PM MST until February 17 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 16
inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph.

* WHERE...Crazy Mountains.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 6 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The cold
wind chills as low as 20 below zero could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Blowing snow will
create poor visibilities as well.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1.

Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at
http://www.weather.gov/billings

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MST MONDAY
